auth_sentence.content: More murkily, what do we mean when we say a person is gifted?

auth_sentence.content: Most disappointingly, the album only murkily evokes the figure of Christ, holding the listener at something of a distance.

auth_sentence.content: Still, the mystery posed by "Oblivion" as a whole is why its mysteries are posed so clumsily, and worked out so murkily.
